description: This file is a Dart source file implementing a DatabaseService class for managing various data models (students, staff, attendance, schedule, messages, notifications) in a kindergarten management system. It includes methods for initializing the database, creating tables, inserting sample data, and performing CRUD operations on each data entity.

classes.name: DatabaseService
classes.description: A singleton class providing database management and CRUD operations for the kindergarten management system.

methods.name: initDatabase
methods.description: Initializes the database, creating tables if they do not exist.

methods.name: insertSampleData
methods.description: Inserts sample data into the database tables for testing or demonstration purposes.

methods.name: insertStudent
methods.description: Inserts a new student record into the database.

methods.name: getStudents
methods.description: Retrieves all active students from the database.

methods.name: getStudent
methods.description: Retrieves a specific student by ID.

methods.name: deleteStudent
methods.description: Marks a student as inactive, effectively deleting them from active records.

methods.name: insertStaff
methods.description: Inserts a new staff member record.

methods.name: getStaffMember
methods.description: Retrieves a specific staff member by ID.

methods.name: deleteStaff
methods.description: Marks a staff member as inactive.

methods.name: getAttendance
methods.description: Retrieves attendance records, optionally filtered by date.

methods.name: deleteSchedule
methods.description: Marks a schedule entry as inactive.

methods.name: getMessages
methods.description: Retrieves all messages, ordered by creation time.
